script: var match = window.location.hash.replace("#!/", "").match(/contact(?:\?query=(.+))/); if(match) document.getElementById("query").value = "Hi Adrian,\n\nI have a job for you that involves some " + match[1].toLowerCase() + " work.";
content:
Name

Email

Query

Say hello, please.

Or have a job for me?

I'm always up for a chat whether it be about work or you need a helping hand. Just send me a message using the form to the left or cooney.adrian@gmail.com. If you're in a stalking mood, you can find me in these various places around the internet:

  1. http://twitter.com/dunxiron
  2. http://github.com/AdrianCooney
  3. http://dribbble.com/Renegade
  4. http://forrst.com/Renegade
